summary.span: 指示 对象要求附属程序集的特定版本。

span.span: Instructs a object to ask for a particular version of a satellite assembly.

remarks.format: ## Remarks ## 桌面应用程序Desktop Apps 在桌面应用中，属性建立主程序集和所有附属项之间的协定。In desktop apps, the attribute establishes a contract between a main assembly and all its satellites. 你将此特性应用于你的主程序集，并将其传递会使用此版本的主程序集的附属程序集的版本号。You apply this attribute to your main assembly, and pass it the version number of the satellite assemblies that will work with this version of the main assembly. 当资源管理器 (对象) 查找资源时，它显式加载主程序集上此属性指定的附属版本。When the resource manager ( object) looks up resources, it explicitly loads the satellite version specified by this attribute on the main assembly. 在更新的主程序集时，则会增加其程序集的版本号。When you update the main assembly, you increment its assembly version number. 但是，你可能不想要运送的附属程序集的新副本，如果现有的与你的应用程序兼容。However, you might not want to ship new copies of your satellite assemblies if the existing ones are compatible with your app. 在这种情况下，递增主程序集的版本号，但保持附属协定版本号不变。In this case, increment the main assembly's version number but leave the satellite contract version number the same. 资源管理器将使用你现有的附属程序集。The resource manager will use your existing satellite assemblies. 如果你想要修改的附属程序集而不是主要的程序集，增加附属的版本号。If you want to revise a satellite assembly but not the main assembly, increment the version number on your satellite. 在这种情况下，将发运和您指出新的附属程序集具有与旧的附属程序集的向后兼容性的附属程序集的发行者策略程序集。In this case, ship a publisher policy assembly along with your satellite assembly stating that your new satellite assembly has backward compatibility with your old satellite assembly. 资源管理器仍将使用旧协定数写入基于你主程序集属性; 但是，加载程序将绑定到指定的策略程序集的附属程序集版本。The resource manager will still use the old contract number written into your main assembly based on the attribute; however, the loader will bind to the satellite assembly version that is specified by the policy assembly. 供应商的共享组件使用发行者策略程序集进行有关发布的程序集的特定版本的兼容性语句。A vendor of a shared component uses a publisher policy assembly to make a compatibility statement about a particular version of a released assembly. 发行者策略程序集是具有名称的格式的强名称程序集`policy...`，在中注册。A publisher policy assembly is a strongly named assembly that has a name in the format `policy...`, and is registered in the . 从 XML 配置文件生成的发布服务器策略 (请参阅) 通过使用[Al.exe （程序集链接器）](~/docs/framework/tools/al-exe-assembly-linker.md)工具。The publisher policy is generated from an XML configuration file (see the ) by using the [Al.exe (Assembly Linker)](~/docs/framework/tools/al-exe-assembly-linker.md) tool. 程序集链接器用于`/link`选项以将 XML 配置文件链接到清单的程序集，然后存储在全局程序集缓存。The Assembly Linker is used with the `/link` option to link the XML configuration file to a manifest assembly, which is then stored in the global assembly cache. 供应商附带包含 bug 修复的维护发行版 （服务包） 时，可以使用出版商策略程序集。The publisher policy assemblies can be used when a vendor ships a maintenance release (service pack) that contains bug fixes. ## [!INCLUDE[win8_appname_long](~/includes/win8-appname-long-md.md)] 应用程序 Apps 在中忽略此属性[!INCLUDE[win8_appname_long](~/includes/win8-appname-long-md.md)]应用程序，因为包资源资源索引 (PRI) 文件没有版本控制语义。This attribute is ignored in [!INCLUDE[win8_appname_long](~/includes/win8-appname-long-md.md)] apps, because package resource index (PRI) files do not have versioning semantics. 此外，[!INCLUDE[win8_appname_long](~/includes/win8-appname-long-md.md)]打包模型要求提供同一个包，而不可能存在的重新部署附属程序集或 PRI 文件中的所有资源。In addition, the [!INCLUDE[win8_appname_long](~/includes/win8-appname-long-md.md)] packaging model requires all resources to ship in the same package, with no possibility of redeploying satellite assemblies or PRI files.
